title: SimpleJaxbTest in quarkus-rest-client-reactive-jaxb-deploymant failing randomly on CI

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

`io.quarkus.rest.client.reactive.jaxb.test.SimpleJaxbTest`, a test in `quarkus-rest-client-reactive-jaxb-deploymant`, has been failing randomly on CI for a few days.

Sometimes it fails for JDK11 but not JDK17, sometimes it fails for JDK17 but not JDK11. So it doesn't look like a JDK compatibility issue, but more likely some race condition.

The logs for one of builds that failed:

